name: The Unestable Man
description:
this a game for the LM0B Beginners Game Jam #8. you are a unnestable man, you have to run and  jump to become a stable man a be free and happy. join on this html journey to become a stable man.

movement 

if you die press esc to go to main menu

jump = up arrow

down =down arrow

right = --->

left = <---

all assets from = https://kenney.nl/
